text: NOI may refer to: * Any of the national informatics olympiads used for selection to the International Olympiad in Informatics, including: ** National Olympiad in Informatics, China, a Chinese annual informatics competition * Nation of Islam, an African American political and religious movement * Net operating income * Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, Nigerian politician * the Nupe–Oko–Idoma languages subgroup of Volta–Niger languages * the Northern Oscillation Index Noi can refer to: * Noi River in Thailand * Noi (Eros Ramazzotti), an album by the Italian singer-songwriter Eros Ramazzotti * Noi the Albino, an Icelandic film by director Dagur Kári * Naie "Noi" Kasahara of The Wallflower * Noi is the family name for one of the most respected families in Ghana * Noi is the Thai word for little * HDJ Noi "WMNF Tampa Radio DJ" * noi is the Romanian word for "us", "we" * Kouat Noi (born 1997), Sudanese-born Australian basketball player
title: NOI
